description: Provides weekly review conversations celebrating achievements and offering encouragement

result.weekSummary: It was a good week for you!
wins: You recorded sales 5 times this week
You identified a pattern of increased sales over the weekend
concerns: Expenses were a bit high, but that's okay
Consider dedicating some time to marketing
result.encouragement: This coming week, try to record sales daily - you've got this! Keep up the wonderful work!
